name: turing_req_id
description: The unique request id generated by Turing, for every incoming request to the Turing router

name: event_timestamp
description: The time at which the final response from the Turing router is generated

name: router_version
description:
The version of the router deployed. This corresponds to the name and version of the router deployed from the Turing app.
 Format: {router_name}-{router_version}.{project_name}

name: request
description: The original request to the Turing router

fields.name: header
fields.description: The header from the incoming request to the Turing router. The map value is a comma-delimited string.

fields.name: body
fields.description: The JSON body of the request to the Turing router, UTF-8-encoded

name: experiment
description: The response from the Experiment engine, if configured

fields.name: response_body
fields.description: The JSON response body from a Turing component (Enricher / Experiment Engine / Router / Ensembler), UTF-8-encoded.

fields.name: error
fields.description: The error from a Turing component, when a successful response is not received.

fields.name: response_header
fields.description: The JSON header body from a Turing component (Enricher / Experiment Engine / Router / Ensembler), UTF-8-encoded.

name: enricher
description: The response from the Enricher, if configured

fields.name: response_body
fields.description: The JSON response body from a Turing component (Enricher / Experiment Engine / Router / Ensembler), UTF-8-encoded.

fields.name: error
fields.description: The error from a Turing component, when a successful response is not received.

fields.name: response_header

fields.name: error

fields.name: response_header
fields.description: The JSON response header from a Turing component (Enricher / Experiment Engine / Router / Ensembler), UTF-8-encoded.

description: The response from the Enricher, if configured

fields.description: The JSON response header from a Turing component (Enricher / Experiment Engine / Router / Ensembler), UTF-8-encoded.
